SEARCH
Package ca.uwo.cs2212.group2.model

Class Word

java.lang.Object
ca.uwo.cs2212.group2.model.Word
public class Word extends Object
Represents a word with its content and correction features.
Author:
Shaylan Pratt, Ryan Hecht

This class provides functionalities to handle a word's content, whether it is correct, its position in a sentence, and possible correction suggestions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Word

      public Word(String content)
      Initializes a new Word instance with the specified content.

      By default, the word is marked as correct, not at the beginning of a sentence, and with no correction suggestions.

      Parameters:
      content - The actual word in string form, without additional metadata.

    • Word

      public Word(String content, int position)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the contents of the other word are equal the contents of this word

      Hashes the word based on its content.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the word and it's metadata. To simply see a string representation of the contents of the word, call Word.getContent.toString().
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the word and it's metadata.

    • addOption

      public void addOption(CorrectionSuggestions option)
      Adds a correction suggestion to the word. If the maximum number of suggestions is reached, replaces the least relevant suggestion.
      Parameters:
      option - the CorrectionSuggestion object passed to the function

    • getOptionsAsStringArray

      public String[] getOptionsAsStringArray()
      Returns the correction suggestions for the word.
      Returns:
      An array of correction suggestions.
